alert.note: Alert for Socorro; Torrance (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 5:17PM MDT until June 02 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Socorro County in central New Mexico... South central Torrance County in central New Mexico... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 516 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gran Quivira, or 29 miles west of Corona, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gran Quivira. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. High winds and large hail can spread quickly across open rangeland. Blowing dust associated with strong thunderstorm winds can reduce visibilities below one quarter mile at times.
